name: Mughlai Biryani Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Mughlai Biryani Recipe: Rice boiled (half done) 750 gm with cloves and bay leaf Chicken 1 kg 12 pcs Potatoes 4 cut into big pcs Salt 1½ tsp heaped Ginger garlic 2 tbsp heaped Black cumin ½ tsp heaped White cumin 1½ tsp Cloves 6 Green cardamom 6 Cinnamon 1 stick or all coarsely grinded Chili powder 3 tsp heaped Nutmeg ½ tsp grind Maze ½ tsp grinded Brown onion 4 tbsp + 2 tbsp Yogurt 2 cups Lemon juice ¼ cup Hot water ½ cup Turmeric ½ tsp Oil ¾ cup Orange color ¼ tsp
instructions: Mix all the above ingredients together in a large pan and leave it for 2 hours Then add ½ cup of hot water and ¾ cup oil, top with boiled rice Then mix orange color with ¼ cup water and put on the rice Cook on medium flame for 45 mins, mix and remove.
